Reviews.Title: No problem
Reviews.Author: Mike D.
Reviews.Content: Mounted this on the top of the front bumper of my 2010 Camaro for a "drive the track" event at Kentucky speedway. I was extremely nervous about  mounting a 400 dollar camera to the bumper, but it held up to almost 100 mph with bumps and breaking with no problems. I won't have any reservations using this way again. Also comes with attachment for a variety of configurations, but I did not use them. Recommended for use on clean surface.

Reviews.Title: Great suction cup
Reviews.Author: Doctor_G
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this suction cup. I recently stuck it to my dirty car to get some video of playing around in the snow, and it stuck like it was glued on! I recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: Great mount. Doesn't budge even when you wipe out.
Reviews.Author: Erez Semaria
Reviews.Content: I use this to attach my Gopro3 on my snowboard. Even though I wipe out pretty bad on occasion, the mount never moves. Very high quality. Highly configurable with additional (included) parts

Reviews.Title: solid mount
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: great mount, sturdy and does not seem like it will fall off like the other chinese crap.  Buy the real deal.

Reviews.Title: The real deal..........
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: I had recently bought a suction cup here on Amazon.......I thought I'd save a couple of bucks and buy a "knock-off"........big mistake!!! it was as worthless as a screen door on a submarine........wouldn't stick to anything......barely stuck to glass.......so, I bought the real deal..........works like a champ!!! The other one is gracing the bottom of a trash can........lesson learned......sometimes, you really do get what you pay for........

Reviews.Title: As described.
Reviews.Author: Thorin Labby
Reviews.Content: Great product, holds on well to surfaces.  It made it through a few crashes without popping off.  A bit cumbersome to adjust.

Reviews.Title: solid suction mount
Reviews.Author: Thomas Y. Pocock
Reviews.Content: This is a stable solid suction mount.However, because it does not have a ball mount under the camera it is difficult and often impossible to position it so that the camera is level.So I had to buy a different suction mount that did have a ball mount.

Reviews.Title: wow...love it
Reviews.Author: David Omalley
Reviews.Content: this comes with so many attachments and different ways to mount the camera.  i love the build quality and not araid of the camera coming off.

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: JohnMc
Reviews.Content: I wanted the GoPro suction cup as opposed to a 3rd party manufacturer, because I wanted to be confident that it was up to the job. I don't mind buying 3rd party bits n pieces, but for this I wanted OEM. I love this suction cup; it's easy to use, and is apparently rated up to 150mph! It's more expensive than the 3rd party copies, but for an extra $20 I feel confident that my GoPro will still be where I left it when I'm done filming my award-winning death-defying stunts! Hey, don't mock me; driving on the roads here is death-defying!!

Reviews.Title: the only one that really work...
Reviews.Author: Luquitas
Reviews.Content: This suction can be attached to anything! and stays there! as far as you want... I bought first a non brand suction cup, and it sucked! This is the real choice

Reviews.Title: Excellent mount
Reviews.Author: DAG
Reviews.Content: The only obstacle that I have encountered with this mount is vibration. I have not used the anti-vibration plug yet with this mount, but it is supposed to eliminate the shake. Other than that, be sure whatever surface you use it on is clean and dry. Have fun!

Reviews.Title: Scary, but awesome
Reviews.Author: Eric Kahn
Reviews.Content: I don't think I will ever have the courage to suction this to the outside of my car, but when I made my cross country trip, I suctioned it to the inside of my windshield for a great dash cam mount. Never once fell down on me over the course of 1300 miles.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Suction Cup Mount
Reviews.Author: JEFF DUGAN
Reviews.Content: The suction cup works excellent in the car and has many different angles you can set it at to get great views.

Reviews.Title: Great suction cup mount
Reviews.Author: Tobias Lundström
Reviews.Content: Works prefect on flat surfaces with good grip, e.g. on the car. I am happy with it and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: This is super nice!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: elimporta2
Reviews.Content: I try it and this is the most important accessory its super secure and I can take pictures and videos from my car.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy
Reviews.Author: Iqbal Mohamed
Reviews.Content: With the price for this original GoPro mount, it is worth every buck you spend on it. Gotta love it!

Reviews.Title: Great suction and holds very well...
Reviews.Author: LawtonGod
Reviews.Content: Suction is great.  many different combinations to hold the camera.  As usual, can't get anything done without screwing and unscrewing forever... :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Brian S.
Reviews.Content: Awesome product and very fast shipping. I used this cup on our drive to California thru the canyons. Highly recommended for any motor enthusiast.

Reviews.Title: suction is not trustworthy
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: its made for dry, flat, non-windy, non-porous surfaces. if you want to attach it to a boat, it will fall off and sink down to the abyss in less than an hour.

Reviews.Title: Pop this on your car and go!
Reviews.Author: AGerrity
Reviews.Content: Bought this to put on the hood, side or anywhere on my Jeep. You can go on the highway without fear of losing the camera.

Reviews.Title: Suction works perfectly and comes with proper attachments
Reviews.Author: Monsoon
Reviews.Content: I used this on a vehicle that was rumbling through the Los Angeles river on hard tires. For those who've ever ridden in less-than-ideal and bumpy terrain, hard tires will make everything in the vehicle jolt. Even though this was mounted on the exterior windshield, it didn't once slip or cause the GoPro attachment to come loose.Pros:- Sturdy and reliable- Comes with all sorts of neat attachmentsCons:- For GoPro beginners, I wish this thing came with instructions on how to use the various attachments effectively

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: yijing zhao
Reviews.Content: GoPro is a good camera during your trevel when you plan drive for visit. because it does not need you spend anothor hand to keep. and it is easy to help you keep monent.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Celestino Cervini "SteeKnow"
Reviews.Content: This is a great suction cup mount for the money. Worked as described and built very well. Highly recommend this to anyone with a GoPro.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Suction Cup Mount
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Taylor
Reviews.Content: It's great, mounted to my truck windshield and recorded my kids when I picked them up from their last day of school. Usually mount it to the back of the boat and record my boys on the wake board, solid mount, haven't lost it yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Robert Dylan Lipe
Reviews.Content: I use this when I go to the lake, stays on securely going 70mph on the Wave runner. Would buy another.

Reviews.Title: Strong Mount
Reviews.Author: Take A Child Fishing
Reviews.Content: This suction cup mount is well designed and has strong adhesion. As with any mount if there is a risk of losing your camera attach a tether. Highly reccomended.

Reviews.Title: Go with Go Pro.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Ellis
Reviews.Content: Another excellent Go Pro product. Easy to use, reliable and value for money. Forget the cheap immatations. Go with the best.

Reviews.Title: az
Reviews.Author: Azalyanet
Reviews.Content: Frankly, very beautiful and wonderful and enjoy luxury and five-star worthyAthvona and always something new to youThanks for the credibility of existing

Reviews.Title: Suction cup
Reviews.Author: David Page
Reviews.Content: So far putting this product through its paces, it has performed as advertised . I would recommend  having  a suction cup mount as part of your arsenal

Reviews.Title: Improved suction clamp.
Reviews.Author: Dan Halyburton
Reviews.Content: This suction cup mount is much improved over the first suction mount. Firm grip but easy to remove.  Nice low profile

Reviews.Title: Great suction and a very steady mount for your GoPro
Reviews.Author: KP
Reviews.Content: I picked up this mount to use on the outside of my Jeep and I can honestly tell you it doesn't disappoint.  I tested it first on smooth roads around town at speeds up to 50mph with no problems but the real test was a full day of off-roading and rock crawling.  I cleaned the surface, attached the mount to the side of the body behind the door and it hadn't budged 10 hours of wheelin' later.  My only complaint is that it's still a little tricky to get exactly the angle you want.  I wish this mount came with a way to rotate just the camera end of the mount 360*.  As far as suction and keeping the camera steady, this mount does a great job!

Reviews.Title: Hold on
Reviews.Author: P. Gavin
Reviews.Content: The GoPro suction  cup mount has been well thought out. The design fulfills the function . It is  very sturdy .

Reviews.Title: GoPro Suction Cup Mount
Reviews.Author: GR "Roadkill"
Reviews.Content: GoPro products are absolutely second to none. Everything I have ordered from GoPro is "The Best" in quality and performance. They are always shipped with not only the product shown but with extra hardware and mounting accessories as well. I love my GoPro equipment. If you want Quality you "get what you pay for" with GoPro. if you want cheap you'll have to shop elsewhere because they don't sell junk. I could not be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the cost
Reviews.Author: KK "verbal2afault"
Reviews.Content: I bought the GoPro specifically to record a driving trip through the French Alps. The suction cup mount made it very easy to place the camera at a convenient spot on the windshield to catch the amazing scenery and sights.

Reviews.Title: Excellent attachment
Reviews.Author: j hassall
Reviews.Content: Excellent device for attaching the camera to smooth surfaces.  Adheres to 150MPH, haven't tested that feature so must take the advert as true

Reviews.Title: What a Amazing Mount for getting amazing shots!
Reviews.Author: Britton Turner
Reviews.Content: Used this mount on the windshield of my truck while on vacation in Colorado and it never budged. Never took it off the entire trip (I will admit I had it tethered just in case it were to come off). Got some amazing film that I otherwise wouldn't have been able to get. I leave it stuck to the inside of my back glass in my truck so I can put it on at a moments notice.Wonderful Product!

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Whitty Teo
Reviews.Content: I need to be able to use the GoPro in car for track, with this, I am able to use it in my car now, works perfect.

Reviews.Title: I didn't expect that
Reviews.Author: Ibram
Reviews.Content: this suction cup is much better than I expectedfirst of all it looks solid built from good material you can tell by looking at it and before even using itit has lots of extras I'm very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Camron
Reviews.Content: It's very nice and strong and holds up very nice I can tell that it is well made best mount

Reviews.Title: This has it's limits..
Reviews.Author: SonicOrbStudios "SonicOrbStudios"
Reviews.Content: I love GoPro and their mounts, but their mounts don't have a ball socket style system so you can only tilt or roll the cam in the way they joint is mounted. I much prefer other mounts compared to what GoPro has here, but none the less, this system DOES work and holds well.

Reviews.Title: Every Go Pro Owner should get one
Reviews.Author: B. Allen "bonanzaguy"
Reviews.Content: I used this to fasten my Go Pro to the plexiglass windows in my airplane so I can shoot out the window while I am flying.  Installs easily, does not come loose.  Very well made, and I love all the little accessories that allow me to configure the suction cup in dozens of different ways.

Reviews.Title: Very Useful
Reviews.Author: gch3
Reviews.Content: I believe this is the one of the most useful mounts for my new GoPro camera.  It will provide a steady base for most of my video efforts with the GoPro.

Reviews.Title: Holds well!
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I just got our GoPro to film our farming/farm related business that uses heavy equipment.  I use this on the glass of the cabs and it holds really well, no extra movement.  I don't think it would go anywhere, but we don't take our chances and use it from the inside only for in-cab videos.  To film outside the cabs, we made a magnet mount that can attach directly to the steel equipment and has superior hold.  Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Large, but works great
Reviews.Author: Miles W. "Miles"
Reviews.Content: Very strong suction, stronger than any other suction cup mount I've used for iPhone, iPad, etc.  It's a little large, so if you're traveling with a host of accessories for your GoPro, this might be something to leave at home unless you really need it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Shawn coss
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! The size makes it easily portable and the quality is great. I highly recommend to any artist

Reviews.Title: Complex But It Works
Reviews.Author: jcphoto
Reviews.Content: It's sometime difficult to figure out exactly which do-dad or arm should connect with the other to get it set up in a particular situation but once you've figured it out it holds well.

Reviews.Title: works great on cars
Reviews.Author: LogJammin90
Reviews.Content: took me a while to figure out how to mount it on places but never fell off, i would recommend tying a little rope to it and close the window on it to prevent it from falling on the pavement.

Reviews.Title: Love Dis-Mount
Reviews.Author: great game
Reviews.Content: This mount works great!  My first time using it was on the body of a car showing it go from 0 to 60 in 5 sec.  It stayed put everywhere it was mounted.

Reviews.Title: It sure does sucks!
Reviews.Author: Bran415 "CA ALL DAY!!!"
Reviews.Content: Suction cup is strong!  I like to fabricate mounts brackets etc or go with 3rd party companies to save that $$. This time  I wanted to make sure that the camera won't be moving around since my car is lowered and the streets of San Francisco is pothole central. Im glad I went with the official Gopro suction mount. This bad boy does not move at all!

Reviews.Title: Vibrates too much
Reviews.Author: Spydie
Reviews.Content: With the long arms on this and long distance from the actual mount, there is way too much vibration on just about anything you can mount it too.  The video is very shaky.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Charlie Burroughs
Reviews.Content: Strapped it to my car the day I got it and never lost the camera, made for great footage too. When I first put it on I tried tugging on it a little to test the strength and it didn't budge.

Reviews.Title: Better than the old one
Reviews.Author: Dalton Campbell
Reviews.Content: I had the old one and it broke easily. This one is more durable and has more options with it.

Reviews.Title: Great suction!
Reviews.Author: Visual8
Reviews.Content: The rubber sticks to clean surfaces very well! You have to be careful with dust and curved surfaces though. 4 stars because it becomes a little bit uncomfortable to handle due to it's relatively big dimension.

Reviews.Title: Go Pro Hero 3 Accessories
Reviews.Author: pfowl62
Reviews.Content: Not sure when I will get to check the 150+ MPH rating though:-D Works very well on the inside of the windshield. Great seller.

Reviews.Title: very sucky, in a good way
Reviews.Author: Batman84
Reviews.Content: This mount is as good as you would expect from GoPro, of course it's a perfect fit they made the camera it goes to

Reviews.Title: Best mount for the GoPro!
Reviews.Author: Z S Liske
Reviews.Content: Suction to the max! If you have a GoPro save yourself the trouble and get the suction cup mount. You will be so glad you did. This is one of the most versatile mounts in the GoPro lineup and will mount on almost anything. Don't be hesitant either. This thing will sustain high speeds on racetracks, freeways, you name it. Well worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Must buy for all!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Cliff Lohner
Reviews.Content: I love this mount.  I mounted it on the windshield of my Lexus ISF, and it was perfect through the canyons...  Next I'll mount it on my SVT Raptor and try some desert running with it...  I also hope to use it on my snowboard...  A must buy for all Go Pro owners...

Reviews.Title: Worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Kristopher Rattansingh
Reviews.Content: You get the most wonderful suction cup mount you can ask for, proven at 150+ mph. a long extenstion arm, 2 short stubby and a long stubby and 2 plates for the quick release.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: It's easy at a car/ pickup to install and in great quality ? And there is a little sack in there where you can store it. ;) and it's also a original go pro product.GoPro Suction Cup Mount

Reviews.Title: Lots of attachments
Reviews.Author: cheap
Reviews.Content: My only gripe with this thing is that it doesn't have the ability (that I can figure out, at least) to pivot on two axis.  There are different attachments you can use to pivot on *either* the x or y axis but not both, which can limit your angles if your mounting surface isn't parallel or perpendicular to your shot.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: PC
Reviews.Content: This product works great. I used it on my car and drove with it and it held very tightly. I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: This thing really SUCKS, in a good way!
Reviews.Author: Vladimir Mitrovic
Reviews.Content: Item came in it's own little black bag, which was an added touch. I have yet to test it out fully, but it holds VERY well. I was able to stick it to a relatively heavy wood table, and it would not budge.

Reviews.Title: Very usable mount!!!
Reviews.Author: betsy3b "betsy3b"
Reviews.Content: We immediately put it to use and it is a regular for us.  Let's see now:  If we buy a wider collar for the dog, will it stay on him as he, quite literally, runs like the wind after the ball we throw?  Nah, probably not, so we'll find a way to mount it to his harness instead.  :-)

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: NinjaVanish
Reviews.Content: Clean the surface well, fog up the suction cup and stick it on.  I have yet to make it really stick on the first try but always on my second try.  I live on the 12th floor of a NYC high-rise where winds howl like crazy sometimes.  I left this over night to capture a time lapse and it worked fine and it did not fall or move, however, I would never mount this anywhere without a tether of some sort just in case ya know.

Reviews.Title: Amazing grip
Reviews.Author: Fareed Chishty
Reviews.Content: I ride a 2006 Honda CBR600RR and let me start by saying that I can mount my GoPro Hero+3 almost anywhere that has a flat surface. I tried it on my 2011 Acura MDX and the results were amazing. Below are a few clips of the GoPro Suction Cup Mount on the bike and on a Lexus GX470.[...][...]

Reviews.Title: Works well - strong
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: This suction cup is easy to apply and locks on nicely with a lever.  I've used it on the outside of a car and it held the camera on just fine.

Reviews.Title: Will stay put at 150 mph on the front of my BMW K1600GT motorcycle
Reviews.Author: James C Puckett
Reviews.Content: If you clean the surface very good where you want to attach the suction cup to ... and leave no soap film, I believe the suction cup really will stay put at 150 mph on the front of my BMW K1600GT motorcycle.

Reviews.Title: It wont come off the car lol
Reviews.Author: Ev_vO
Reviews.Content: So i was a little judgement before i received the product because i would think it would come off the car and the suction on this device is crazy strong. Tip clean the area before attaching like any other suction so that it wont get any dust and come off.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely great
Reviews.Author: Leonardo
Reviews.Content: There is really no need to talk much about a product with such a reputation. Is the best suction cup for the GoPros. The only bad thing i find about it is that you cannot fit it to small surfaces. You will need a smaller cup for this and GoPro will not have them available. I have attached this cup to a lot of cars running drag strip races on 1/4 mile and it has never failed me. Even on 9 second dragsters and no signs of trying to get loose.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff
Reviews.Author: GregA
Reviews.Content: I've seen how they use these on the outside of cars and airplanes on TV, so I'm pretty sure it'll stay stuck on my stuff... ;)

Reviews.Title: suction doesn't always hold
Reviews.Author: Lisa F.
Reviews.Content: We haven't used it much as of yet, but so far we have had some issues with the suction staying power on certain surfaces when practicing with it.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Suction Cup Mount
Reviews.Author: Phillip Castro Jr
Reviews.Content: mounts works well. only complaint is the suction at times after pushing the suction button and locking it down  doesn't stick and i have to use my hand to press for it to hold.  not sure if this is an issue at all but i know its not a user error since i have other mounts that work when i press the button then lock it in place.

Reviews.Title: Good, solid mounting!
Reviews.Author: Andre Bernier
Reviews.Content: Awesome mounting and suction power, even on a car withstanding highway speeds!  Recommend to all who need auto shots!  A must have for all GoPro users.

Reviews.Title: If you use it right, this. thing. will. STICK!
Reviews.Author: David Symonds
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews on the Go Pro website I was wary of attaching this to my snowboard. Being on vacation, I said screw it, let's do this! I made sure to clean the cup and snowboard surface with a damp paper towel, dry it, and lock it down while the board and mount were indoors. I put it right before the front binding in the middle for a cool low-angle shot. After first exposing it to the cold for an hour or two, and then carving through thick, heavy powder amidst jumps and hard landings for at least 2 hours with it on, it DID NOT BUDGE. I plan to try the same approach on the outside of my car when it gets warmer out - will update if performance is less than exceptional.

Reviews.Title: Excellent suction
Reviews.Author: Lauren Capece
Reviews.Content: I took this mount on a standup paddle board adventure and it was perfect for that. Stuck to the board well and I was able to get great footage with my gopro!

Reviews.Title: Great GoPro mount
Reviews.Author: Mr. C
Reviews.Content: I have used this mount a few times now and am very impressed.  It is a bit bigger than I thought it would be but it works well, never came off and meets my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Don't even bother with the imitations
Reviews.Author: Michael Reynolds
Reviews.Content: When you want to make sure your camera is secure, the official mount is the way to go.This mount has survived 130mph, and bumpy off-road trails without issue.

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: Eric Thomas
Reviews.Content: This thing is super solid. Used it for the first time today and couldn't be happier. Great buy for your camera.

Reviews.Title: Holds well
Reviews.Author: Elvis
Reviews.Content: Wet it, set it, and forget it.  I have it mounted on the interior of my windshield to record my off-roading adventures and snowy commutes to work.  I has remained mounted for weeks now with no problem.  One day I'll get enough nerve to mount it on my hood.

Reviews.Title: He loves it...
Reviews.Author: Ramona
Reviews.Content: My nephew loves this accessory to video his skating adventures. It is exactly as advertised and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: It sucks, on a good way!
Reviews.Author: ChazFarote
Reviews.Content: Attached this to my car, on the quarter panels and on the hood, for some track videos. It stays on.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Suction Cup Mount
Reviews.Author: Sandy S "Sandy S"
Reviews.Content: Item is exactly as described. It is excellent quaility; arrived quickly; and I have no complaints. I would recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Incredible mount
Reviews.Author: Reechpayne
Reviews.Content: I have literally stuck this thing to drywall so you can imagine how well it grips smooth surfaces, it is definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: GoPro suction Cup mount
Reviews.Author: G. A. Larson
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product that works as advertised.  Always best to buy real GoPro products.  Completely satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: to for the show
Reviews.Author: Richard Stalnaker
Reviews.Content: now i can keep my camera in one place during burnouts or just doing donuts yes this mount sticks to paint

Reviews.Title: Stood up to every test thus far!
Reviews.Author: Rybread982
Reviews.Content: Great product, there are a number of different mounting pieces that help this product orient in various ways (side mount, front mount, top mount, etc.)  I've used it a number of times mounted to the exterior of my truck in rain and in snow and it hasn't budge once... and that was with a fair amount of speed and movement.The suction seal is very strong.  There is a button on the top that you depress to 'extend' the suction cup.  Once you press firmly down on the surface, there is a lever that you push down to really increase the suction.  It's darn near impossible to move or pull off once it's firmly attached.  Releasing is easy, just pull up the lever and separate the suction cup.  Leaves absolutely no marks or scratches on the car.Mine came with a small carry bag which is very helpful as there are a number of additional attachments for this mount.Highly recommended and worth the price paid.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Goodies
Reviews.Author: N2PAINT
Reviews.Content: This is awesome. The suction cup will stay put on almost every surface you stick it to. I feel more comfortable mounting to the windows on my car since these are completely smooth. Only sown fall is, I think it should have come with a tether or leash to keep from it dropping if you loose the suction on the mount.

Reviews.Title: Best suction GoPro mount available
Reviews.Author: CT
Reviews.Content: This mount is awesome. I can put it on my hood, trunk, window or anything smooth and flat. Has held up to 70 mph. Will test it more once the snow is gone and I run Mid-Ohio in the spring.

Reviews.Title: Great for auto racing
Reviews.Author: Donny A.
Reviews.Content: Love this mount. The price isn't bad being an amazon prime member. Holds very secure on your car while going around the track. I am very impressed with the strength of this mount and the versatility for awesome angles

Reviews.Title: Accessories indispensable with
Reviews.Author: mohammed
Reviews.Content: Accessories indispensable with goproType a very good fit for all glass surfacesVery high safety with the use of GoPro Suction Cup Mount

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Drew Davis
Reviews.Content: I'm so excited to use this! Pair it with my new WIFI backpack and I'm good to go!  I'm excited!

Reviews.Title: Works well with my GoPro camera
Reviews.Author: DougO "DougO"
Reviews.Content: Solid construction, attaches easily, and holds tight. With the mounts available it will be very useful! I will be using it often.

Reviews.Title: As advertised! Great hold and accessories included..
Reviews.Author: Austin John Wolff
Reviews.Content: The mount is VERY sturdy and includes the accessories needed to achieve most any mounting angle. I'd recommend this product to a friend

Reviews.Title: Works but w/Shortcomings
Reviews.Author: Roger Fox
Reviews.Content: Whole thing, with all it's parts and there are plenty, is based on a flat glass surface and right angles.  You'd think there would be a ball and socket thing to accommodate curved windshields but nope!  I have a Land Rover and any position, on the front wind shield, other than center will give you a crooked picture and since all the attachments are based on right angles there is NO WAY to correct!Speaking of attachments . . . don't ever drink before you try to figure out which is the perfect attachment for your situation.  You'll give up!  Being sober takes long enough!  Again, a ball and socket arrangement would solve this problem.

Reviews.Title: Works great, only on certain surfaces
Reviews.Author: Gregory Richards
Reviews.Content: Bought this to help with my videos on YouTube. Tried to mount it on my dash of the our minivan and it kept popping off. Then put it on the smooth plastic disc for my GPS and Presto! Worked like a charm. The surface needs to be smooth for this to work.

Reviews.Title: These really 'Suck'! (In a good way)
Reviews.Author: D. Hodge
Reviews.Content: I own 3 of these for my 3 GoPros. I attach them to my vintage Porsche 911 via the suction cup mounts. I've had it up to 120 mph, and the cameras held firm. I took advice from another post, and clean the area I plan on positioning the cup to with rubbing alcohol. Find the strongest you can get. It won't harm paint, but removes dirt, grease, and wax. (re-wax when finished) My only 'gripe' and it's minor, is the instructions are not so great. In a nutshell, release locking lever, push center of cup onto whatever you're attaching to, then move locking lever into place. It should be a little difficult to lock. If not, you haven't got it right. Once locked, wiggle it hard. It should be rock solid. Attach your GP, and have fun! (If you're interested in seeing them in action: [...]

Reviews.Title: Sucks. Hard.
Reviews.Author: Super Cereal "Steve"
Reviews.Content: I've stuck this thing to the hood of my car and driven over 80 mph and it didn't budge.  Cold weather, hot weather - didn't matter.  I'd make sure whatever you stick it to is clean and smooth, but after using it many times to film from the hood and roof of my car, I don't ever worry that it will fall off.

Reviews.Title: Just what I expected
Reviews.Author: Mike Bowers
Reviews.Content: I am afraid to hang my $300.00 camera on a Chinese mount so I broke down and bought the original from Go Pro for piece of mind. I f you have other GoPro equipment you know what I mean.

Reviews.Title: Really does hold
Reviews.Author: Matthew R.
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about this truly holding tight to the side of my car.  But even after some big potholes at highway speeds, it was still exactly where I mounted it.  No movement, much less detachment.  Just be sure to clean the surface thoroughly before attaching.  Also, I like to use saliva to moisten it before attaching (i.e., lick the suction cup).  Using plain water will allow it to slip, where the starch in human saliva acts as a better seal.

Reviews.Title: Amazing suction... should have been metal
Reviews.Author: Dave W
Reviews.Content: This 1st-party suction mount has an incredible grip.  I'm a 180lb. athletic build guy and I couldn't pull it off my granite countertop while it was engaged. Having said that, the plastic arm that supports the camera would have given out if I put my full body force behind it.  I'm confident that you can attach this to a car and go sailing through the mud (my Tacoma TRD "Roxanne" and I will be testing this out next weekend in low-country) without losing it.I'm a touch disappointed that it wasn't made of some kind of sturdy metal like reinforced aluminum or even nylon wrapped resin.  This is just plain old HDPE plastic.  However, it's GoPro, and they stand behind their stuff, so if you have an issue with it, they will jump at the chance to make it right.Minus 1 star for the support arm build materials.

Reviews.Title: Great suction cup for your gro pro
Reviews.Author: Chief3377
Reviews.Content: I tested out this section cup device on my BMW M3 and test at speeds in excess of hundred miles an hour. I had no issues with the product and I felt that it was solid and performed well. The only issue I have is that the product did not come with any type of instructions as it took me some time to figure out how to make the compression of the suction cup secure. Otherwise it would've given this five stars  I believe GoPro should put in some type of basic instructions so that people don't put their $500 camera outside the car as I can see some people making a mistake on how to use this product

Reviews.Title: Great Suction Cup!
Reviews.Author: Donald Gardner
Reviews.Content: This is a must have product for your Go Pro Camera. The only reason why I put 4 stars is you need to add other extensions to it to make it more user friendly. If they had a swivel it would make this the best product on the market. A little expensive but you don't have to worry about losing your Go Pro.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Henrique
Reviews.Content: I got this and have been using for a while and it works very good!It doesn't shake or vibrate and the parts seem durable

Reviews.Title: Sticks to anything!
Reviews.Author: Josh Carroll
Reviews.Content: This suction cup came with a quick delivery and I used it right out of the box. It will literally stick to anything you want it too.

Reviews.Title: Guanteed Suction!
Reviews.Author: Robin hembree
Reviews.Content: It works! It's practical , easy and reliable! I really enjoy knowing I can use my Go Pro with 100% satisfaction!

Reviews.Title: Go Pro Mount
Reviews.Author: GPS User
Reviews.Content: Suction cup mount arrived on schedule and is well built for the task.  Another option for the camera.  Would purchase again from this vendor.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievably awesome
Reviews.Author: Jeremi Smyers
Reviews.Content: I am in awe over this thing, I put it on my motorcycle and figured I might be losing a camera that day, NOPE, this thing did not even phase, stayed attached the whole time, it really works great, the vibration is a little more I thought it would be but I can handle it to know that my camera wont dissapear at high speed.

Reviews.Title: Falls off windshield
Reviews.Author: Jae Lee
Reviews.Content: I mounted this to the inner side of the windshield in my grandfather's Toyota Venza, which has a fairly straight windshield.  It fell off immediately.  Yes, I pressed it on there, and activated the suction lock.  Suction cups tend to work better when wet, so I put a little water on it and tried it.  It seemed to work well, but within 30 minutes it had fallen off again.If this doesn't work with on the Venza, there is no way it's going to work on my Lotus Elise, which has a much rounder front windshield.I am returning this immediately.

Reviews.Title: Ultimate Sports Camera
Reviews.Author: Jerry M.
Reviews.Content: Very small camera with many mounting options.  Great for sports filming and very rugged when in the supplied case; water proof too.

Reviews.Title: Bought this thing
Reviews.Author: Runar Josefsson
Reviews.Content: this is not working as it is supposed to work.  The smaller screw does not fit and i am unable to put this thing together bcs of that.

Reviews.Title: great addition for a gopro
Reviews.Author: steller feller
Reviews.Content: I cannot give a full and accurate review on this yet. I have not had the opportunity to test it. However, the product is solid and I believe that it will stand up to all the claims made about its stability.

Reviews.Title: WORST
Reviews.Author: James Blaney
Reviews.Content: GoPro needs to have aftermarket companies design there adapters. It's like a Lego set without plans. Still haven't found the flexibility in this product. Can't return because I recycled the box it was packed it. Bought a knockoff for 1/3 the price and I love the less expensive one attached to my Harley's front fender

Reviews.Title: lost gopro hero3+ black because of suction cup
Reviews.Author: Andy Galkin
Reviews.Content: Couple of days ago lost my gopro hero3+ black (and 64gb samsung card, additional $70) because of suction cup.I was driving ~60 mph from Oakland to Milpitas. After 30 minutes of ride my gopro felt from the roof of my Subaru Forester. Gopro was installed on the roof on the suction cup.

Reviews.Title: No directions.
Reviews.Author: Clutch
Reviews.Content: Haven't had a chance to use it, but it's some industrial sized suction cup so it should hold just fine. It's just a pain to set up because there are pieces they send you along with the pieces you have from the camera itself. Too many pieces and there are NO DIRECTIONS that come with this item. You'll have to watch a tutorial on Youtube or something. Enjoy nonetheless.EDIT 9/1/13: This item SUCKS! It sticks to just about everything BESIDES MY CAR! The whole point is so I can use the application then just stick it to my car and record. Nope, went out for a test drive yesterday and had to hold the thing out the window. It stayed on my windshield, hood, car for about two minutes, and the fastest speed I could reach was 60mph before it came rolling off. My car was clean. Very clean, and it still did not stick to it. When I tried it on a mini-fridge we have outside in our garage, that's dirtier than my car, it stuck with no problem. So I tried a dirty part of my car, and the same problem happened. This item is defective and I can't even replace it because it's not available again until February 1st. So now I'll be receiving a refund for a defective item that had NO DIRECTIONS and I'm assuming DID NOT come with all its parts.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible with all HERO3+ cameras
Includes: (1) Suction Cup and Standard Base
Includes: (1) Adjustable Arms
Includes: (1) Quick Release Base
Includes: (1) Drawstring Bag
ProductInfo.Name: GoPro Suction Cup Mount
